TopicTitle: Finally Decided to commit to something.

Articles.Content: Hello, I finally thought it was time for me to register so I didn't have to keep Google-ing the threads I'm keeping track of. I've never coded in my life but somehow the idea of modding something has become lodged in my brain and thus, I here for that help too. See you around.

Hello warpaholic, and welcome to the forums!

There is much help to be had here, both for the player and modder alike. Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Hi!

Yup, it's always easier to favorite threads. You can also post to ask new questions, too!

Welcome aboard!
Yes welcome the forum. You will find the majority of people here are very helpful. So ask anyone, anything.

You will find the majority of people here are very helpful. So ask anyone, anything.

But don't be surprised when the answer is 42.
Hello and welcome to the KSP forums warpaholic, hope you enjoy the community here!
Welcome! And that name is awesome! we all love timewarp
